channel.title: power on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in power on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-27
item.description: Exclusive: This is our first look at Android 13 “Tiramisu” and some of its upcoming features (5 minute read) A source with access to a very early Android 13 build has shared screenshots showing several upcoming features and changes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-25
item.description: Apple’s new M1 Max MacBook Pro may get a virtual turbo button for High Power Mode (2 minute read) The upcoming macOS Monterey will feature a High Power Mode in the new 16-inch M1 Max MacBook Pros.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-26
item.description: Google launches its third major operating system, Fuchsia (3 minute read) Fuchsia is Google’s latest operating system for the Google Home Hub.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-31
item.description: Snap Plans Hardware Push With AR Spectacles, Drone (1 minute read) Snap’s next-gen Spectacles will be able to layer Snapchat lenses onto the surrounding environment without using a smartphone’s camera.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-03
item.description: Microsoft Mesh aims to bring holographic virtual collaboration to all (5 minute read) Microsoft Mesh is Microsoft’s ambitious new attempt at unifying holographic virtual collaboration across multiple devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-29
item.description: TikTok’s one-night Ratatouille musical will star some of Broadway’s biggest names (2 minute read) Ratatouille: The TikTok Musical will have a lineup of Broadway’s biggest names for its January 1st streaming performance.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-06
item.description: WhatsApp now lets you post ephemeral messages that disappear after 7 days (4 minute read) WhatsApp users can now mark messages to disappear after seven days.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-05
item.description: Watch SpaceX ACTUALLY hop Starship SN-5 150m!!! (55 minute video) SpaceX recently performed its first test flight on Starship SN-5.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-07
item.description: Secretive data startup Palantir has confidentially filed for an IPO (2 minute read) Palantir is a secretive data and analytics startup that provides technologies to clients such as the US government.
